channel.title: The Brett Cooper Show
channel.description: The Brett Cooper Show explores how generational shifts and cultural trends are reshaping our values, behaviors, relationships and communities. Through a blend of video essays and interviews, Brett uncovers how we can build stronger connections with each other and foster resilience within ourselves as we navigate a world in constant flux.
channel.author: Brett Cooper
channel.itunes:author: Brett Cooper
channel.itunes:summary: The Brett Cooper Show explores how generational shifts and cultural trends are reshaping our values, behaviors, relationships and communities. Through a blend of video essays and interviews, Brett uncovers how we can build stronger connections with each other and foster resilience within ourselves as we navigate a world in constant flux.

item.title: Let’s Talk About Right-Wing Cancel Culture | Episode 1
item.description:
Should former liberals be welcomed into the conservative movement?


The Brett Cooper Show on Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/@bbrettcooper


Joining Cooper Confidential means you're not just a viewer, you're part of the movement that supports independent creators and challenges the status quo. Don't miss out on this unique opportunity to be closer to the commentary that's shaping tomorrow’s conversations. Sign up now to unlock your access to Cooper Confidential and get a front row seat to all the action: https://cooperconfidential.supercast.com/
